Name: Amber Negroni
Ingredients: 12.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: This very serious Negroni has great depth of flavour with mocha coffee and bitter gentian.
History: Created in January 2015 by Matthias Lataille at the Cabinet Room, London, England using Martell V.S.O.P. cognac.
Nutrition: One serving of Amber Negroni contains 189 calories
